blogPost.title: How is blackness represented in various digital domains? Answer by André Brock, author of Distributed Blackness. https://t.co/BDvviagm4e https://t.co/CBexNbHCgT
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 様々なデジタル領域で、黒さはどのように表現されるのか？Distributed Blackness』の著者であるAndré Brock氏による回答。https://t.co/BDvviagm4e https://t.co/CBexNbHCgT
黑人在各种数字领域是如何表现的？回答者：André Brock，《分布式黑》的作者。https://t.co/BDvviagm4e https://t.co/CBexNbHCgT
黑人在各種數字領域是如何表現的？回答者：André Brock，《分佈式黑》的作者。https://t.co/BDvviagm4e https://t.co/CBexNbHCgT

previous.title: What are your best stress relieving tips for entrepreneurs? Answer by @KunalLunawat, GP & Co-founder at @AgyaVentures. https://t.co/y0Net8YB6t https://t.co/Q1s7jY6ev2

localize.full_text: 起業家におすすめのストレス解消法を教えてください。Answer by @KunalLunawat, GP & Co-founder at @AgyaVentures. https://t.co/y0Net8YB6t https://t.co/Q1s7jY6ev2
您对创业者有什么好的缓解压力的建议？回答者：@KunalLunawat，GP & @AgyaVentures的联合创始人。https://t.co/y0Net8YB6t https://t.co/Q1s7jY6ev2
您對創業者有什麼好的緩解壓力的建議？回答者：@KunalLunawat，GP & @AgyaVentures的聯合創始人。https://t.co/y0Net8YB6t https://t.co/Q1s7jY6ev2

next.title: Can employers ask for proof of vaccination? Answer by Kara Govro, Senior HR Law Analyst. https://t.co/RgwcH7Weu8 https://t.co/y9fo7SqrEL

localize.full_text: 雇用主は予防接種の証明を求めることができますか？回答者：Kara Govro, Senior HR Law Analyst. https://t.co/RgwcH7Weu8 https://t.co/y9fo7SqrEL
雇主可以要求提供疫苗接种证明吗？回答者：Kara Govro，高级人力资源法律分析师。https://t.co/RgwcH7Weu8 https://t.co/y9fo7SqrEL
僱主可以要求提供疫苗接種證明嗎？回答者：Kara Govro，高級人力資源法律分析師。https://t.co/RgwcH7Weu8 https://t.co/y9fo7SqrEL
